sourcesContent: const StudentRow = ({ student, index, isEditing, isBooking, editData, setEditData, setEditingIndex, setBookingIndex, handleEditClick, handleBookClick, handleSave, handleVaccinationSave, handleDelete, handleMarkAsVaccinated }) => { return ( {student.name} {student.class} {student.studentId} {student.bookingStatus || 'N/A'} {student.vaccineName || 'N/A'} {student.vaccinationDate || 'N/A'} {student.vaccinationStatus || 'Pending'} ); }; export default StudentRow;
